summary: The mod adds a new companion into the game, a bosmer shaman known as Cian.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140830/4085JZI8c8.png[/img]
[img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140830/RD61jfiIwk.png[/img]
[size=3]The mod adds a new standalone companion into the game, a bosmer shaman known as Cian.
Cian is essential and marriageable. He has unique set of equipment and spells.
He can be found in Falkreath, at the Dead man’s Drink.
[b]
Requirements:[/b]
[b]Skyrim version 1.9.32.0[/b][/size]


[img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140830/75K4IEq8zz.png[/img]
[size=3](Manually)
Place mod's files to your Data folder. Activate CianBosmerShaman.esp in the game launcher.[/size]


[img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140830/9T4C91390t.png[/img]
[size=3](Manually)
Dismiss Cian as your follower. Save game.
Then remove files from following folders
-Data/CianBosmerShaman.esp
-Data/meshes/CIAN
-Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/CianBosmerShaman.esp
-Data/textures/CIAN
-Data/textures/actors/character/facegendata/FaceTint/CianBosmerShaman.esp[/size]


[img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140830/3bNzI8uE05.png[/img]
[size=3]Bethesda for Skyrim
Geonox for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]Face textures[/url]
Urshi for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145/?]Smooth Male Body normal maps [/url]
His subcredit list includes:
Imperator3 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19159/?]Mens Underwear replacer [/url]
neovinci – meshes,
and BaronDavid - textures.
Kris Jay for [url= http://krisjaydesigns.com/2182/blog/skyrim-tattoo-psds-male] Male body tattoo[/url]
luddemann for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33213/?]Shaman armor[/url]
galy3 for [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10995/?]Earrings[/url]
DreamBurrow for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39983/?]Regal Huntsman Armor[/url]
nuska for [url= http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48329/?]Hair[/url]
My dear friend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1932308/?]Aisaka[/url] for testing and screenshots.[/size]

[img]http://www.picshare.ru/uploads/140830/25kh51KoQ2.png[/img][/center]
author: Nightshade
